name: Banana Split (Demo)
description:
Play Mr. Banana who must save his Baby Banana from the evil Blender who has kidnapped him!

Early test version to learn how to program a platformer in GDevelop.

It was a real rush to finish this test demo in the 2 weeks as I am new to GDevelop Game Platform but I am looking forward to working on weekly updates and monthly level additions from March 2023. I am also new to Itch so bear with me as I get used to everything!

Please send feedback, bug reports and encouragement in the comments or DM.

Let's see where this goes. Enjoy!

-GAMING TSUNAMI-


PS. This game was made for the following Game Jam:

My First Game Jam: Winter 2023
